snippet.title: Iji trailer - Remar Games
snippet.description:
Download: https://www.remar.se/daniel/iji.php

The official trailer for Iji by Remar Games. The song is from the Iji soundtrack. Music Composed by Chris Geehan & Dan Byrne-McCullough ( http://www.hyperduck.co.uk/ )

The video itself took about two days, large parts were screenshotted manually frame by frame since the movie recording program was a bit iffy. Props to VirtualDub though, I used it to put the whole thing together and sync the music.

You may recognize certain graphics from one of my other games, Garden Gnome Carnage. I actually made these a few years ago for Iji, and later reused them in GGC, not the other way around.
